import java.util.Scanner;


public class Main {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
		
		int t = in.nextInt();
		
		for(int i = 0; i < t; i++){
			long a = in.nextLong();
			System.out.println(solve(a));
		}
		
		in.close();
	}

	private static String solve(long a){
		String ans = "NO";
		
		for(int i = 2; i <= 60; i++) {
			
			long b = (long)Math.pow(a, 1.0/i);
			
			if( pow(b, i) == a || pow(b+1, i) == a || pow(b-1,i) == a ) return "YES";
			
		}
	
		return ans;
	}
	
	private static long pow(long a, long b){
		
		if(b == 0) return 1;
		
        long res = pow(a, b/2); 
        
        if(b % 2 == 1) return res*res*a;
        
        return res*res;
	}
}
